text:
[Verse]
Starry sky we meet tonight
In your eyes the world feels right
Hold my hand let's take this flight
Dancing in the pale moonlight

[Verse 2]
City sleeps the night is young
Whispers on our lips unsung
Hearts are beating like a drum
Shadows merge become as one

[Chorus]
Moonlit dance we spin around
Floating up without a sound
Lost in love and lost in dreams
Moonlit dance our hearts it seems

[Verse 3]
Broken world but here we're whole
Moon above will take control
In this moment you and me
Find our place where we are free

[Bridge]
Lights can fade but we remain
Moonlight heals away the pain
Every step is like a prayer
In your arms I’m floating there

[Chorus]
Moonlit dance we spin around
Floating up without a sound
Lost in love and lost in dreams
Moonlit dance our hearts it seems
title: Moonlit Dance
